# 串列複製應用（shallow, deep）

```{python}

mySports = ['basketball', 'baseball']
print('My favorite sports: ', mySports)
johnSports = mySports
print("John's favorite sports: ", johnSports)

mySports.append('football')
print('='*80)    # 我是分隔線
print('My favorite sports: ', mySports)
print("John's favorite sports: ", johnSports)

```

```{python}

mySports = ['basketball', 'baseball']
print('My favorite sports: ', mySports)
johnSports = mySports[:]    # deep copy
print("John's favorite sports: ", johnSports)

mySports.append('football')
print('='*80)    # 我是分隔線
print('My favorite sports: ', mySports)
print("John's favorite sports: ", johnSports)

```
